channel.title: [pi] source help
channel.description:
hey, i have a question. I own [pi] source. when i edit any .java file from (folder:src) it wont update the .class's in (folder:bin) why is this? and how do i update the .class's?
it wont change sever name why is this.

item.title: [pi] source help
item.dc:creator: @Tehlife Tehlife
item.description:
@Tehlife wrote:

I know I just didn’t feel like it gonna go sleep soon.

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] source help
item.dc:creator: @JaydenD12 JaydenD12
item.description:
@JaydenD12 wrote:

[quote=“Tehlife, post:8, topic:376567”][quote author=AustenGreen link=topic=472493.msg3455491#msg3455491 date=1294010102]

Write your compiler here

@echo off Title Xxxx-Xxxxx Compiler javac *.java pause
[/quote]

@echo off :build cls "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_Yourjdkversionhere\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause goto :build pause

Were it goes Yourjdkversionhere you type your jdk version number[/quote]

If you set your environmental variables correctly you don’t need to set the location of javac all the time.

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] source help
item.dc:creator: @AustenGreen AustenGreen
item.description:
@AustenGreen wrote:

[quote=“Tehlife, post:12, topic:376567”]I’ll tell you why it didn’t update, it’s because you got 100 errors that you need to solve or post for help.
This compiler I gave you works 100% else he wouln’t show that you have errors in your server.[/quote]
k thanks.

Read full topic

item.description:
@AustenGreen wrote:

[code]@echo off :build cls "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_Yourjdkversionhere\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause goto :build pause[/code]

Were it goes Yourjdkversionhere you type your jdk version number

still didnt update
